title: Evil Under the Sun
description: From the Audible page:The beautiful bronzed body of Arlena Stuart lay face down on the beach. But strangely, there was no sun and Arlena was not sunbathing - she had been strangled.Ever since Arlena's arrival the air had been thick with sexual tension. Each of the guests had a motive to kill her, including Arlena's new husband. But Hercule Poirot suspects that this apparent "crime of passion" conceals something much more evil.Â©1941 Agatha Christie Limited (P)1992 Chivers Press Ltd
author: Agatha Christie
